text: George Carter (January 10, 1944 â€“ November 18, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He was a 6'4" swingman. He was born in Buffalo, New York. His career lasted from 1967 to 1977. He played for the Detroit Pistons and for the New York Nets. Carter died on November 18, 2020 in Las Vegas, Nevada at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Detroit Pistons players Category:Sportspeople from Buffalo, New York Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: George Carter (basketball)
